Name: Arif Miah
Role: Full Stack MERN Developer | Aspiring Tech Leader
Location: Chittagong, Bangladesh

Summary:
I am a passionate full stack web developer specializing in the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js), with strong TypeScript skills and modern frontend/backend expertise. Currently pursuing a B.Sc. in Computer Science and Engineering, I combine solid programming fundamentals with creativity from my science background and storytelling skills. My mission is to build accessible, performant, and scalable web applications that positively impact users and communities.

Skills:
- Frontend: React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, Redux Toolkit, Tailwind CSS, Material UI, Shadcn UI, Framer Motion
- Backend: Node.js, Express.js, REST API, JWT, Socket.io, Firebase Auth, Stripe integration
- Database: MongoDB, Mongoose, Data modeling, Query optimization
- Tools & Deployment: Git, GitHub, Vercel, Netlify, Postman, ESLint, Zod
- Additional: C, C++, Python basics, Linux commands, Figma, GIMP, Inkscape

Projects:
- Medi-Sphere: Medicine management full-stack app with React, Redux, Node.js, MongoDB
- Cycle-Sphere: Bicycle e-commerce platform using Next.js, Shadcn UI, Stripe payments
- Vibe Chat: Real-time chat application built with Socket.io and React
- Clyst: Social journaling app leveraging Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS
- Color Contrast Checker: Accessibility tool ensuring UI/UX compliance

Education:
- B.Sc. in Computer Science & Engineering (In Progress)
- Programming Hero: Completed Level 1 & 2 web development courses focusing on full-stack JavaScript technologies

Leadership Vision:
I aspire to be a future leader across human and AI domains, blending technical excellence, creativity, and ethical influence to shape the digital future responsibly and innovatively.
